verbs.description: [ARG1: atlantic hurricanes] [V: fueled] [ARG2: by rapid intensification] it usually takes several days to a week for a tropical storm to grow into a hurricane but if conditions are just right a powerful major hurricane can develop in just hours hurricane patricia cuba hurricane michael atlantic atlantic ocean michael guy dominica hurricane maria national hurricane center miami harvey mexico florida us yucatan cnn afp
